mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stockcomment (comment_content, comment_author, comment_content_id) values (#{commentContent}, #{commentAuthor}, #{commentContentId})
mapper.select: SELECT sc.comment_id AS commentSelectId, sc.comment_content as commentSelectContent, sc.comment_author as commentSelectAuthor, sc.comment_date as commentSelectDate, sc.comment_content_id as commentSelectContentId, hc.likeCount FROM stockcomment sc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT commentSelectId, COUNT(*) AS likeCount FROM heart GROUP BY commentSelectId ) hc ON sc.comment_id = hc.commentSelectId WHERE sc.comment_content_id = #{idValue}

SELECT comment_id as commentSelectId, comment_content as commentSelectContent, comment_author as commentSelectAuthor, comment_date as commentSelectDate, comment_content_id as commentSelectContentId FROM stockcomment WHERE comment_id = #{commentIdValue}
SELECT comment_id as commentSelectId FROM stockcomment WHERE comment_author = #{commentSelectAuthor}
